__inputs.name: DS_UNIFI
__inputs.label: Unifi
__inputs.description: This data source is created by unifi-poller.

description: This dashboard provides insights for the Network Switches in your Ubiquiti UniFi powered network. This dashboard is part of a group.

panels.description: Shows data transferred for ports: $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Data Transfer

panels.description: Shows data transfer rate per second for Switch $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Data Transfer: Switch $Port

panels.description: Shows broadcast and multicast packets per second for Switch $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Multicast & Broadcast: Switch $Port

panels.description: Shows errors and dropped packets for Switch $Port. RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Errors and Drops: Switch $Port

panels.description: Shows packet counters for Switch $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Packets Per Second: Switch $Port

list.definition: show tag values from "usw" with key="site_name"
list.name: Site
list.query: show tag values from "usw" with key="site_name"

list.definition: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="device_name" where site_name =~ /$Site$/
list.name: Switch
list.query: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="device_name" where site_name =~ /$Site$/

list.definition: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="port_id" where device_name =~ /$Switch$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/
list.name: Port
list.query: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="port_id" where device_name =~ /$Switch$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/

title: unifi-poller: UniFi USW Insights
